pages.text: $(marked)Polymorph$() must be one of the most versatile potion effects. When a Polymorph potion is consumed, the target will change its form into the target of the $(l:bewitchment:tools/taglock)$(item)Taglock$() used.$(br2)The brew can be made into a $(item)Splash Potion$() or similar variants, just like other brews.

pages.title: Polymorph
pages.text: Intensity does not have an effect on this potion.$(br2)This potion only works if created from a Taglock of another player.
